sentences.cn: [谚]神射手也有射不中的时候;智者千虑,必有一失.

sentences.en: City's principal marksman was Joe Harvey who scored seventeen goals.
sentences.cn: 市队的头号射手是打进17粒进球的乔·哈维。

sentences.en: He is the boldest and best marksman I have ever encountered.
sentences.cn: 他是我见过最大胆、最优秀的狙击手.

sentences.en: It is used as a sniper rifle, designated marksman rifle and several smaller niche areas.
sentences.cn: 它被作为狙击步枪, 以及“精确射手”步枪使用,或是用于提供远程支援火力.

sentences.en: Marksman is one of the basic conditions for reaction speed.
sentences.cn: 神射手的基本条件之一就是反应速度.

sentences.en: Marksman: Arrow knights go through rigorous training.
sentences.cn: 神射手: 羽箭骑士要经过严酷的训练.
警察中的神枪手开了火。

sentences.en: Sasha Vujacic emerges as arguably the best 3 point marksman off any NBA bench.
sentences.cn: 可以预见,萨沙-武贾西奇将以NBA板凳上最出色的三分射手出现.

sentences.en: The marksman squeezed off successive rounds and every one told.
sentences.cn: 射击运动员连扣板机,弹无虚发.

sentences.en: The marksman trained his sights on the target.
The Marksman uses modified ammunition that has a chance to ricochet off enemies and walls.
sentences.cn: “射手使用改性弹药,有机会弹离敌人和墙壁”.

sentences.en: The People says Chelsea, Manchester United and Manchester City are all sniffing around their proven marksman.
sentences.cn: 《人物》杂志声称:切尔西, 曼联,曼城都对这名战绩累累的神射手垂涎欲滴.

sentences.en: This would have been largely unfair to the Marksman players.
sentences.cn: 这将大部分已经被不公平的射手的球员.

trans.tran_cn: 神枪手，〈美〉二等射手，轻兵器射手的最低等级
trans.tran_en: someone who can shoot a gun very well
